blocks.name: cnei
blocks.content: Extend class notation with neighborhood relation for topologies.
blocks.origin: const class cnei { nei }

blocks.name: diff.cnei.s
diff.cnei.c
diff.cnei.w
df-nei
blocks.content: Define a function on topologies whose value is a map from a subset to its neighborhoods. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nei(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cnei, cmpt(s0, ctop, cmpt(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), crab(s2, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-nei(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  âŠ¢ nei =(s0 âˆˆ Top â†¦(s1 âˆˆ P(â‹ƒ s0)â†¦ { s2 âˆˆ P(â‹ƒ s0)| âˆƒ(s3 âˆˆ s0,(s1 âŠ† s3 âˆ§ s3 âŠ† s2))}))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s2, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: neifval
blocks.content: Value of the neighborhood function on the subsets of the base set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neifval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cnei, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cnei, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cnei, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), universe), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  mptexg(s0, cpw(c1), universe, crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, ctop, cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))), universe, cnei, cmpt(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))
  pweqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rexeq(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  df-nei(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crab(s1, cpw(c1), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm neifval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ Top â†’(nei ` c0)=(s0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))}))
  âŠ£ c1 = â‹ƒ c0
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 âˆˆ Top â†’(nei ` c0)=(s0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))})), d(s2, c1))
  mpdan(c0 âˆˆ Top, (nei ` c0)=(s0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))}), (s0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))})âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  3syl(c0 âˆˆ Top, (s0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))})âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1 âˆˆ c0, P(c1)âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  mptexg(s0, P(c1), universe, { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))})
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, ctop, (s0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))}), universe, cnei, (s0 âˆˆ P(â‹ƒ hs0)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(â‹ƒ hs0)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ hs0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))}))
  mpteq12dv(s0, P(â‹ƒ hs0), { s1 âˆˆ P(â‹ƒ hs0)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ hs0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))}, P(c1), { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))}, hs0 = c0)
  rabeqbidv(s1, P(â‹ƒ hs0), P(c1), hs0 = c0, âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ hs0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1)), âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1)))
  pweqd(â‹ƒ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(â‹ƒ hs0, c1, â‹ƒ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  rexeq(s2, hs0, c0, (s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))
  df-nei(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(s2 âˆˆ c0,(s0 âŠ† s2 âˆ§ s2 âŠ† s1))}))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, â‹ƒ hs0)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)

blocks.name: neif
blocks.content: The neighborhood function is a function from the set of the subsets of the base set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neif(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c1)), wfn(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), cpw(c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wfn(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), cpw(c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, cpw(c1), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  rabexg(hs2, cpw(c1), universe, wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  fnmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), universe, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  fneq1d(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c1), cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(hs2, cpw(c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  neifval(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs2.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neif(class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ Top â†’(nei ` c0)[Fn]P(c1))
  âŠ£ c1 = â‹ƒ c0
} = {
  mpbird(c0 âˆˆ Top, (nei ` c0)[Fn]P(c1), (hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))})[Fn]P(c1))
  syl(c0 âˆˆ Top, (hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))})[Fn]P(c1), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ P(c1), { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))} âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  ralrimivw(hs0, P(c1), c0 âˆˆ Top, { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))} âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  3syl(c0 âˆˆ Top, { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))} âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c1 âˆˆ c0, P(c1)âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  topopn(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  rabexg(hs2, P(c1), universe, âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2)))
  fnmpt(hs0, P(c1), { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))}, universe, (hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))}))
  eqid((hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))}))
  fneq1d((nei ` c0), P(c1), (hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)â†¦ { hs2 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c0,(hs0 âŠ† hs1 âˆ§ hs1 âŠ† hs2))}), c0 âˆˆ Top)
  neifval(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 âˆˆ Top)
  diff.hs2.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: neiss2
blocks.content: A set with a neighborhood is a subset of the base set of a topology. (This theorem depends on a function's value being empty outside of its domain, but it will make later theorems simpler to state.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm neiss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
} = {
  elpwid(c2, c3, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wcel(c2, cpw(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0))))
  elfvdm(c1, cfv(cnei, c0), c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wb(wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0))), wcel(c2, cpw(c3))))
  eleq2d(c2, cdm(cfv(cnei, c0)), cpw(c3), wcel(c0, ctop))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cdm(cfv(cnei, c0)), cpw(c3)), wfn(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c3)))
  neif(c0, c3)
  fndm(cfv(cnei, c0), cpw(c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neiss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c2))â†’ c2 âŠ† c3)
  âŠ£ c3 = â‹ƒ c0
} = {
  elpwid(c2, c3, (c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c2)))
  mpbid((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c2)), c2 âˆˆ P(c3), c2 âˆˆ dom((nei ` c0)))
  adantl(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c2), c2 âˆˆ dom((nei ` c0)))
  elfvdm(c1, (nei ` c0), c2)
  adantr(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c2), (c2 âˆˆ dom((nei ` c0))â†” c2 âˆˆ P(c3)))
  eleq2d(c2, dom((nei ` c0)), P(c3), c0 âˆˆ Top)
  syl(c0 âˆˆ Top, dom((nei ` c0))= P(c3), (nei ` c0)[Fn]P(c3))
  neif(c0, c3)
  fndm((nei ` c0), P(c3))
}

blocks.name: neival
blocks.content: Value of the set of neighborhoods of a subset of the base set of a topology. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neival(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), c1)))
  fveq1d(cfv(cnei, c0), c1, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  neifval(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c2), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c2), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), universe))
  biimpar(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cpw(c2)), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c0))
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c1)

thm isnei(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wcel(c3, crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))
  eleq2d(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  neival(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c3, crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c3, crab(hs0, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wa(wcel(c3, cpw(c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))))
  elrab(hs0, c3, cpw(c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c3, cpw(c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))), wss(c3, c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c3, cpw(c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c2, c0))
  topopn(c0, c2)
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  elrab(hs0, c3, P(c2), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† hs0)), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c3, (c1 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† hs0), (c1 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c3, c1 âŠ† s0, s0 âŠ† hs0, s0 âŠ† c3)
  sseq2(hs0, c3, s0)
  anbi1d(c0 âˆˆ Top, c3 âˆˆ P(c2), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)), c3 âŠ† c2)
  syl(c0 âˆˆ Top, (c3 âˆˆ P(c2)â†” c3 âŠ† c2), c2 âˆˆ c0)
  topopn(c0, c2)
  elpw2g(c2, c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs0.w(âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)))

thm neiint(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  3anibar(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  sstrd(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), cv(hs0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  simprrl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))
  adantrrl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  3adantl2(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c3)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  ssntr(c0, c3, c2, cv(hs0))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))))
  syl12anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c0), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c0), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, c2))
  ntropn(c0, c3, c2)
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3))), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, c2))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)))
  ntrss2(c0, c3, c2)
  rspcev(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c0, wa(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3)), wa(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c3), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3)), wss(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c3), c3))

}

thm neiint(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2)â†’(c3 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c1)â†” c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3)))

} = {
  bitrd((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2), c3 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c1), c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3), âˆƒ(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3)))
  3anibar(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âŠ† c2, c3 âŠ† c2, c3 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c1), âˆƒ(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3)))
  3adant3(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âŠ† c2, c3 âŠ† c2, (c3 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c1)â†”(c3 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ âˆƒ(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3)))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  impbid((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2), âˆƒ(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3)), c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3))
  rexlimdvaa(hs0, c0, (c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2), (c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3), c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3))
  sstrd(c1, ((int ` c0)` c3), hs0, ((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2)âˆ§(hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§(c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3))))
  simprrl((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2), hs0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âŠ† hs0, hs0 âŠ† c3)
  adantrrl((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2), hs0 âˆˆ c0, c1 âŠ† hs0, hs0 âŠ† c3, hs0 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3))
  3adantl2(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âŠ† c2, c3 âŠ† c2, (hs0 âˆˆ c0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3), hs0 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3))
  ssntr(c0, c3, c2, hs0)
  ex((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2), c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3), âˆƒ(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3)))
  syl12anc(((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2)âˆ§ c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3)), âˆƒ(hs0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âŠ† hs0 âˆ§ hs0 âŠ† c3)), ((int ` c0)` c3)âˆˆ c0, c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3), ((int ` c0)` c3)âŠ† c3)
  syl2anc(((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2)âˆ§ c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3)), ((int ` c0)` c3)âˆˆ c0, c0 âˆˆ Top, c3 âŠ† c2)
  ntropn(c0, c3, c2)
  simpr((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2), c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3))
  syl2anc(((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ c3 âŠ† c2)âˆ§ c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3)), ((int ` c0)` c3)âŠ† c3, c0 âˆˆ Top, c3 âŠ† c2)

  simpl3(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âŠ† c2, c3 âŠ† c2, c1 âŠ†((int ` c0)` c3))

blocks.name: isneip
blocks.content: The predicate "the class ` N ` is a neighborhood of point ` P ` ". (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm isneip(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c1))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c1))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c1))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))), wss(csn(c1), c2))
  snssi(c1, c2)
  isnei(s0, c0, csn(c1), c2, c3)
  adantl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))), wa(wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))))
  anbi2d(wcel(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)), wa(wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))
  anbi1d(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3), wss(csn(c1), cv(s0)))
  snssg(c1, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ c2)â†’(c3 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` { c1 })â†”(c3 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âˆˆ s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)))))
  âŠ£ c2 = â‹ƒ c0
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)

} = {

  sylan2(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âˆˆ c2, (c3 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` { c1 })â†”(c3 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,({ c1 } âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)))), { c1 } âŠ† c2)
  snssi(c1, c2)
  isnei(s0, c0, { c1 }, c2, c3)
  adantl(c0 âˆˆ Top, c1 âˆˆ c2, ((c3 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âˆˆ s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)))â†”(c3 âŠ† c2 âˆ§ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,({ c1 } âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)))))
  anbi2d(c1 âˆˆ c2, c3 âŠ† c2, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c1 âˆˆ s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,({ c1 } âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, c1 âˆˆ c2, (c1 âˆˆ s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3), ({ c1 } âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c3))
  anbi1d(c1 âˆˆ c2, c1 âˆˆ s0, s0 âŠ† c3, { c1 } âŠ† s0)

blocks.name: neii1
blocks.content: A neighborhood is included in the topology's base set. (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm neii1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wss(c1, c3), wss(c2, c3))
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  impancom(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, c3), wss(c1, c3))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c1, c3), wa(wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1)
  simpl(wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  âŠ£ c3 = â‹ƒ c0

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: neisspw
blocks.content: The neighborhoods of any set are subsets of the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm neisspw(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), cpw(c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), cpw(c2), wcel(c0, ctop))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  neii1(c0, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  selpw(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ctop))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  sylibr((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ hs0 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c1)), hs0 âˆˆ P(c2), hs0 âŠ† c2)
  neii1(c0, hs0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: neii2
blocks.content: Property of a neighborhood. (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm neii2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  impancom(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, cuni(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c2, cuni(c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))), wa(wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
  isnei(s0, c0, c2, cuni(c0), c1)
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  simpr(wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ Top âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ((nei ` c0)` c2))â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c2 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c1)))

  isnei(s0, c0, c2, â‹ƒ c0, c1)

  simpr(c1 âŠ† â‹ƒ c0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c0,(c2 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ s0 âŠ† c1)))

blocks.name: neiss
blocks.content: Any neighborhood of a set ` S ` is also a neighborhood of any subset ` R C_ S ` . Similar to Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.2. (Contributed by FL, 25-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm neiss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c3)))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c3)), wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wss(c1, cuni(c0)))
  neii1(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  neii2(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wi(wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  reximdv(hs0, c0, wss(c3, c2), wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  anim1d(wss(c3, c2), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c3, cv(hs0)))
  sstr2(c3, c2, cv(hs0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c3)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c3, cuni(c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2))
  sstrd(c3, cuni(c0), c2, w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c3, c2), wss(c2, cuni(c0)))
  neiss2(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c3, cuni(c0), c1)
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c3, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm neiss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: ssnei
blocks.content: A set is included in any of its neighborhoods. Generalization to subsets of ~ elnei . (Contributed by FL, 16-Nov-2006.)

blocks.name: elnei
blocks.content: A point belongs to any of its neighborhoods. Property V_iii of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3. (Contributed by FL, 28-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: 0nnei
blocks.content: The empty set is not a neighborhood of a nonempty set. (Contributed by FL, 18-Sep-2007.)

blocks.name: neips
blocks.content: A neighborhood of a set is a neighborhood of every point in the set. Proposition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.2. (Contributed by FL, 16-Nov-2006.)

blocks.name: opnneissb
blocks.content: An open set is a neighborhood of any of its subsets. (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm opnneissb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wb(wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  3imp(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wi(wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))))
  exp43(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1)), wss(c1, c3))
  eltopss(c0, c1, c3)
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  mpanr2(wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c1), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, c0, wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c1, c1)), wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c1, c1))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, c1)
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wa(wss(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c0, wa(wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  isnei(hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c0), wss(c2, c3), wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, c1)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)), wss(c2, c1))
  ssnei(c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c2, c1), wss(c1, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: neindisj

  impr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wcel(c3, c2))

  adantrr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(c4, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c4), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))

  anassrs(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  sylanbr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wa(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c3, cv(hs0))), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1))))

blocks.name: opnneiss
blocks.content: An open set is a neighborhood of any of its subsets. (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2007.)

blocks.name: opnneip
blocks.content: An open set is a neighborhood of any of its members. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: opnnei
blocks.content: A set is open iff it is a neighborhood of all of its points. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: tpnei
blocks.content: The underlying set of a topology is a neighborhood of any of its subsets. Special case of ~ opnneiss . (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)

blocks.name: neiuni
blocks.content: The union of the neighborhoods of a set equals the topology's underlying set. (Contributed by FL, 18-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm neiuni(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(c2, cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  eqssd(c2, cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(c2, cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)))
  tpnei(c0, c1, c2)
  elssuni(c2, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cuni(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), c2), wral(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  neii1(c0, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  unissb(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1), c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: neindisj2
blocks.content: A point ` P ` belongs to the closure of a set ` S ` iff every neighborhood of ` P ` meets ` S ` . (Contributed by FL, 15-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm neindisj2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))))
  elcls(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)

  ralrimiv(s0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls)))), wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wral(hs0, c0, wi(wcel(c3, cv(hs0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(c3))), wne(cin(cv(s0), c1), emptycls)))

blocks.name: topssnei
blocks.content: A finer topology has more neighborhoods. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)

thm topssnei(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(cnei, c1), c4), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, c3)), wss(c0, c1)))

  simpl2(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, c3), wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4))))

  ntropn(c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  mpbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)))), wss(c4, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)), wss(c4, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c4, c2), wss(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)))), wss(c4, c2), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c4)))
  neiss2(c0, cv(hs0), c4, c2)

  opnneiss(c1, cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), cv(hs0)), c4)

blocks.name: innei

blocks.name: neiptopreu
blocks.content: If, to each element ` P ` of a set ` X ` , we associate a set ` ( N `` P ) ` fulfilling Properties V_i, V_ii, V_iii and Property V_iv of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.2. , corresponding to ~ ssnei , ~ innei , ~ elnei and ~ neissex , then there is a unique topology ` j ` such that for any point ` p ` , ` ( N `` p ) ` is the set of neighborhoods of ` p ` . Proposition 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3. This can be used to build a topology from a set of neighborhoods. Note that ~ innei uses binary intersections whereas Property V_ii mentions finite intersections (which includes the empty intersection of subsets of ` X ` , which is equal to ` X ` ), so we add the hypothesis that ` X ` is a neighborhood of all points. TODO: when ~ df-fi includes the empty intersection, remove that extra hypothesis. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jan-2018.)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, (TopOn ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c0)
  diff.ctopon.s(s1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, s3, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, (s1 âˆˆ c0 â†¦((nei ` c2)` { s1 })))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, ((nei ` c2)` { s1 }))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (nei ` c2), { s1 })
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cnei, c2)
  diff.cnei.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
